name: Buds (budy_paco)
description:
This was created in 48 hours for the Global Game jam 2023 sing the theme: Roots.

In this game you play as a group of little helper buds in service to an AI governed terraforming bot. Your purpose is to help the R.O.O.T. (Recovery Organizer and Operational Terraforming) AI bot spread its roots throughout this dying planet left behind by the life forms that inhabited it, and reclaim it to make the land hospitable for life again. As you explore you will gather more buds to join your group which will help you traverse the dangerous environment. Can you save this planet?
